tweet.text: In the 1890s, #Germany and the US had an ongoing dispute about the zinc content of imported apple slices dried on racks made of zinc. May your #ApplePieDay be happy and zinc-free! https://t.co/pJd2svS167 #FRUS
tweet.html: In the 1890s, #Germany and the US had an ongoing dispute about the zinc content of imported apple slices dried on racks made of zinc. May your #ApplePieDay be happy and zinc-free! history.state.gov/historicaldocu… #FRUS
